title: "How can the use of arts and senses lead to the Integrazione and Reintegration of the self?"
first_phrase: This text discusses the integration of the senses and the arts in achieving a higher level of consciousness. The author cites ancient wisdom traditions, such as Plato's belief in the symbolism present in basic arts like geometry and mathematics, as well as Dante's use of numerology in describing the transcendence of the mind. The text also examines the role of sensibility and senses in developing the multifaceted intelligence of a person. In the last part (200 tokens), the author provides additional techniques for achieving a higher level of consciousness. This includes learning to observe and interpret sensory data accurately, as well as developing the ability to imagine and remember vividly. The techniques presented also help to transform the internal power of a person, leading to a more successful life in the external world.

In particolare abbiamo sostituito alla parola «dialettica» il concetto di «logica», alla «retorica» il più moderno «espressione». Notiamo che il termine «linguaggio» può anche riferirsi alla danza e all’espressione corporea.
